short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dictionary Lookup, Text Translation, Vocabulary analyzer, Youtube dual caption player

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LingoTube Extension is a must-have extension for learning English!

ENGLISH DICTIONARY WITH ONE CLICK:
+ Text translating up to 133 languages.
+ Learn new vocabulary, phrases and idioms while browsing the web.
+ Extract Important Vocabulary in sentences: idioms, phrases and words, we identify the context of the sentence and give you the correct definition and meaning.
+ See real examples of peoples using English words/phrases from million of YouTube videos,
+ Watch any YouTube video with dual caption mode.

And many more awesome features will be released!
Visit our website to improve your English: https://lingotube.net
